info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 01 at 3:15PM CDT until July 01 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN PERRY...SOUTHERN JEFFERSON AND NORTHWESTERN FRANKLIN COUNTIES... At 315 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Tamaroa, or 11 miles west of Rend Lake Area, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Mount Vernon, Rend Lake Area, Woodlawn, Tamaroa, Waltonville and Nason. This includes the following highways... Interstate 57 in Illinois between Mile Markers 88 and 98. Interstate 64 in Illinois between Mile Markers 63 and 83. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
